132 {
133 switch (props->dir) {
134 case Flow::Direction::HORIZONTAL:
135 if (attrs->_w_has_changed) {
136 horizontal_fixed_width();
137 } else {
138 horizontal_free_width();
139 }
140 break;
141 case Flow::Direction::VERTICAL:
142 if (attrs->_h_has_changed) {

147 break;
148 }
